requirement: This code is intended to implement the control of UI button states for ground and sky tracks based on input parameters for level, index, and direction.
provide_code:
FUNCTION setButtonByDirect : BOOL
VAR_INPUT
	level		:INT;	//1->地轨	2->天轨
	idx			:INT;	//挡板索引编号
	direct		:TargetDirect;
END_VAR
